name: Scribing Spell Scrolls
description: With time and patience, a spellcaster can transfer a spell to a scroll, creating a Spell Scroll. The character must have the spell prepared or among their known spells, and must provide any material components required by the spell. The character must also have proficiency in the Arcana skill.
requirements: The spell must be prepared or known by the character
The character must provide material components consumed by the spell
notes: If the scribing is interrupted, the attempt fails and the materials are wasted. A day of scribing requires 8 hours of work.
